dataCollection.title: Data Collection
content: Users are informed that when visiting the site, a cookie may automatically install on their browser software. By browsing the site, users choose to accept cookies or not. A cookie is an element that does not identify the User but is used to record information relating to their navigation on the website. Users can disable cookies through the settings in their browser software.
